_header: Sloth and idleness must be forsaken
_description: On putting aside sloth and idleness and taking up strength and steadfastness, in a sermon by John Waldeby — one couplet

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
Sclewthe & ydilnesse most be forsakunStrenkthe &
                    stedfastnesse most be vndertakun
